RTCDataChannelReliable.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The read-only RTCDataChannel property
reliable indicates whether or not the data channel is
reliable.

blockquote.para:
This property is obsolete. Use instead in any
new code, and update existing code as soon as possible.

RTCDataChannelReliable.value:
true if the 's connection is reliable;
false if it isn't.
